wikipedia_page.main: Gordon Campbell FBA (born 1944) is a professor of Renaissance Studies at the University of Leicester known for his work on Milton and on the King James Bible.  Campbell is one of the "world's leading authorities on the King James Bible." He has published extensively in a number of areas.
